install.name: Dynamic Tree
install.author: Mosets Consulting
install.description: Mosets Tree dTree is a javascript Tree Menu that lets you browse tree menu in a tree like structure

param.name: root_catid
param.label: Parent Cat ID
param.description: The starting(parent) category ID. Default is 0

param.name: cat_level
param.label: Category Level
param.description: The number of category level to show. Enter 0 for unlimited level. Default is 2

param.name: category_order1
param.label: Category Ordering
param.description: This decides how the categories are ordered. The custom ordering can be controlled by editing the 'ordering' field in jos_mt_cats table.

param.name: category_order2
param.label: Category Ordering Direction
param.description: The default ordering direction is descending.

param.name: width
param.label: Width
param.description: Dtree is created on top of its own layer and the width allow you to control the width of dtree. Default is 159 (in pixels)

param.name: listing_order1
param.label: Listing Ordering
param.description: This decides how the listings are ordered. The custom ordering can be controlled by editing the 'ordering' field in jos_mt_links table.

param.name: listing_order2
param.label: Listing Ordering Direction
param.description: The default ordering direction is descending.

param.name: show_empty_cat
param.label: Show empty category
param.description: Show a category even there is no sub category and listing

param.name: show_totalcats
param.label: Show category count
param.description: Show the total number of sub categories

param.name: show_totallisting
param.label: Show listing count
param.description: Show the total number of listing

param.name: closesamelevel
param.label: Close Same Level
param.description: Only one category within a parent can be expanded at the same time
